body:
I got my pets from my darkness package I got in avicus. I only have ender man and bat that work, but like creeper and zombie and all the other ones it says I don't have permission, and on enderdragon and spider it says @6spider could not be found and same with enderdragon...
Please help

title: I don't have my pets! PLEASE HELP

replies.body: If you do not receive your purchase within 48 hours, please email support@avicus.net with the transaction ID.
replies.body_tagged: If you do not receive your purchase within 48 hours, please email support@avicus.net with the transaction ID.

replies.body: I made the purchase like 1 month ago, and YoUrFaCeHaHa ordered it for me and I don't think he has the I'd ....
